title: Technology-Enhanced Mathematics Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Course Focused on Developing Technology-Integrated Strategies for Mathematics Education, Targeting Pre-Service Elementary Teachers and Job Seekers

learning_goals: Learners complete project outcomes by utilizing digital tools (interactive whiteboards, educational software) over 80% for math problem-solving.
Learners write an effectiveness analysis report for technology-enhanced lessons through peer feedback and instructor formative assessments.
Learners apply technology-integrated pedagogies (e.g., video production, online collaboration tools) in team-based PBL activities to design creative lessons.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
